column4: la brenda kay le. bleu devall. may 11
column6: 2015 send card. brenda kay le. bleu devall
column8: of lake charles passed away at 7:45 am on friday
column10: 2015 in a local hospice facility. mrs. devall was born on may 11
column12: ga. she was a commercial fisherman for 16 years in big lake
column13: known as the crab lady. mrs. devall was also a commercial truck driver from 1987 until 2007. she was a life member of the ladies auxiliary vfw #2130 and belonged to the martha rebekah #11 since 1978. those left to cherish her memory are three sons
column14: tony l. guillory and wife loretta and paul r. le. bleu both of lake charles
column15: and scott e. le. bleu and wife brandy of moss bluff; daughter
column18: kenneth guillory and wife carolyn of lacassine and david guillory and wife lolly of moss bluff; six grandchildren
column24: lana; four great grandchildren; two nieces
column25: heather and stacy guillory; a nephew
column26: ruben guillory; and a daughter and grandchildren of her heart
column27: angel baccigalopi and kay-kay and matt baccigalopi. she was preceded in death by a husband of 18 years
column33: jr. and b. paul mc. gahee; and a husband
column35: sr. funeral services will be held at 2:00 pm on monday
column37: 2015 in the johnson funeral home chapel. the rev. gary evers will officiate. burial will follow in pujol cemetery in big lake. visitation will begin on sunday from 3:00 pm until 9:00 pm and will resume on monday from 8:00 am until the start of the service.
